title: Secret Mayhem
description: Shay's guilt is becoming unbearable, and with the war raging on, the number of deaths are piling up. It's only a matter of time before Shay must confess what he knows. Even if it costs him his leather cut - and his life.When Ava Winline finds herself unexpectedly hiding among untamed MC outcasts, it becomes even more vital that she keeps her true identity a secret. When the Lost Men are called upon to help Back Down Devil, it is the perfect opportunity to find a new escape... or so she thinks.When Ava arrives with the Lost Men, Back Down Devil doesn't exactly welcome her warmly. But as she climbs off the back of a motorcycle, the terror in her eyes has an unexpected effect on Shay. When he offers to keep her safe, neither of them realize the danger it will bring to the club.When Shay's secret is uncovered, will his club turn him over to the enemy in order to stop the war, or will his loyalty to them be enough to save his life?
author: London Casey
